segments.pli: “Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, atītamaddhānaṃ samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā tisso vidhā pajahiṃsu, sabbe te sattannaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā.
segments.en: “Mendicants, all the ascetics and brahmins in the past who have given up the three discriminations have done so by developing and cultivating the seven awakening factors.

segments.pli: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, anāgatamaddhānaṃ samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā tisso vidhā pajahissanti, sabbe te sattannaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā.
segments.en: All the ascetics and brahmins in the future who will give up the three discriminations will do so by developing and cultivating the seven awakening factors.

segments.pli: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, etarahi samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā tisso vidhā pajahanti, sabbe te sattannaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā.
segments.en: All the ascetics and brahmins in the present who are giving up the three discriminations do so by developing and cultivating the seven awakening factors.
The awakening factors of mindfulness, investigation of principles, energy, rapture, tranquility, immersion, and equanimity.

segments.pli: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, atītamaddhānaṃ samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā tisso vidhā pajahiṃsu … pe …
segments.en: All the ascetics and brahmins in the past …

segments.pli: pajahanti, sabbe te imesaṃyeva sattannaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā”ti.
segments.en: and present who give up the three discriminations do so by developing and cultivating the seven awakening factors.”

suttaplex.blurb: Anyone who abandons the three kinds of discrimination does so due to the awakening factors.
